009
010package imagingbook.common.threshold.adaptive;
011
012import ij.plugin.filter.RankFilters;
013import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
014import ij.process.FloatProcessor;
015import imagingbook.common.filter.generic.GenericFilter;
016import imagingbook.common.filter.linear.GaussianFilterSeparable;
017import imagingbook.common.threshold.BackgroundMode;
018import imagingbook.common.threshold.Utils;
019import imagingbook.common.util.ParameterBundle;
020
021/**
022 * This version of Niblack's thresholder uses a circular support region, implemented 
023 * with IJ's rank-filter methods.
024 * 
025 * @author WB
026 * @version 2022/08/01
027 */
028public abstract class NiblackThresholder implements AdaptiveThresholder {
029        
030        public enum RegionType { Box, Disk, Gaussian }
031        
032        public static class Parameters implements ParameterBundle {
033                
034                @DialogLabel("Radius")
035                public int radius = 15;
036                
037                @DialogLabel("kappa")
038                public double kappa = 0.30;
039                
040                @DialogLabel("d_min")
041                public int dMin = 5;
042                
043                @DialogLabel("Background mode")
044                public BackgroundMode bgMode = BackgroundMode.DARK;
045        }
046        
047        private final Parameters params;
048        protected FloatProcessor Imean;
049        protected FloatProcessor Isigma;
050
051        private NiblackThresholder() {
052                super();
053                this.params = new Parameters();
054        }
055
056        private NiblackThresholder(Parameters params) {
057                super();
058                this.params = params;
059        }
060        
061        // method to be implemented by real sub-classes:
062        protected abstract void makeMeanAndVariance(ByteProcessor I, int radius);
063        
064        @Override
065        public ByteProcessor getThreshold(ByteProcessor I) {
066                final int M = I.getWidth();
067                final int N = I.getHeight();
068                makeMeanAndVariance(I, params.radius);
069                ByteProcessor Q = new ByteProcessor(M, N);
070                final double kappa = params.kappa;
071                final int dMin = params.dMin;
072                final boolean darkBg = (params.bgMode == BackgroundMode.DARK);
073                
074                for (int v = 0; v < N; v++) {
075                        for (int u = 0; u < M; u++) {
076                                double sigma = Isigma.getf(u, v);
077                                double mu = Imean.getf(u, v);
078                                double diff = kappa * sigma + dMin;
079                                int q = (int) Math.rint((darkBg) ? mu + diff : mu - diff);
080                                if (q < 0)       q = 0;
081                                if (q > 255) q = 255;
082                                Q.set(u, v, q);
083                        }
084                }
085                return Q;
086        }
087        
088        // -----------------------------------------------------------------------
089        
090        public static NiblackThresholder create(RegionType regType, Parameters params) {
091                switch (regType) {
092                case Box :              return new NiblackThresholder.Box(params);
093                case Disk :     return new NiblackThresholder.Disk(params);
094                case Gaussian : return new NiblackThresholder.Gauss(params);
095                default :               return null;
096                }
097        }
098        
099        // -----------------------------------------------------------------------
100        
101        public static class Box extends NiblackThresholder {
102
103                public Box() {
104                        super();
105                }
106                
107                public Box(Parameters params) {
108                        super(params);
109                }
110
111                @Override
112                protected void makeMeanAndVariance(ByteProcessor I, int radius) {
113                        int M = I.getWidth();
114                        int N = I.getHeight();
115                        Imean =  new FloatProcessor(M, N);
116                        Isigma =  new FloatProcessor(M, N);
117                        final int n = (radius + 1 + radius) * (radius + 1 + radius);
118
119                        for (int v = 0; v < N; v++) {
120                                for (int u = 0; u < M; u++) {
121                                        long A = 0;     // sum of image values in support region
122                                        long B = 0;     // sum of squared image values in support region
123                                        for (int j = -radius; j <= radius; j++) {
124                                                for (int i = -radius; i <= radius; i++) {
125                                                        int p = Utils.getPaddedPixel(I, u + i, v + j); // this is slow!
126                                                        A = A + p;
127                                                        B = B + p * p;
128                                                }
129                                        }
130                                        Imean.setf(u, v, (float) A / n);
131                                        Isigma.setf(u, v, (float) Math.sqrt((B - (double) (A * A) / n) / n));
132                                }
133                        }
134                }
135                
136        }
137        
138        // -----------------------------------------------------------------------
139        
140        public static class Disk extends NiblackThresholder {
141                
142                public Disk() {
143                        super();
144                }
145                
146                public Disk(Parameters params) {
147                        super(params);
148                }
149
150                @Override
151                protected void makeMeanAndVariance(ByteProcessor I, int radius) {
152                        FloatProcessor mean = (FloatProcessor) I.convertToFloat();
153                        FloatProcessor var =  (FloatProcessor) mean.duplicate();
154                        
155                        RankFilters rf = new RankFilters();
156                        rf.rank(mean, radius, RankFilters.MEAN);
157                        Imean = mean;
158                        
159                        rf.rank(var, radius, RankFilters.VARIANCE);
160                        var.sqrt();
161                        Isigma = var;
162                }
163        }
164        
165        // -----------------------------------------------------------------------
166        
167        public static class Gauss extends NiblackThresholder {
168                
169                public Gauss() {
170                        super();
171                }
172                
173                public Gauss(Parameters params) {
174                        super(params);
175                }
176                
177                @Override
178                protected void makeMeanAndVariance(ByteProcessor I, int r) {
179                        // //uses ImageJ's GaussianBlur
180                        // local variance over square of size (size + 1 + size)^2
181                        int M = I.getWidth();
182                        int N = I.getHeight();
183                        
184                        Imean = new FloatProcessor(M,N);
185                        Isigma = new FloatProcessor(M,N);
186
187                        FloatProcessor A = I.convertToFloatProcessor();
188                        FloatProcessor B = I.convertToFloatProcessor();
189                        B.sqr();
190                        
191                        double sigma = r * 0.6; // sigma of Gaussian filter should be approx. 0.6 of the disk's radius
192                        
193//                      GaussianBlur gb = new GaussianBlur();
194//                      gb.blurFloat(A, sigma, sigma, 0.002);
195//                      gb.blurFloat(B, sigma, sigma, 0.002);
196                        
197                        GenericFilter gaussian = new GaussianFilterSeparable(sigma);
198                        gaussian.applyTo(A);
199                        gaussian.applyTo(B);
200
201                        for (int v = 0; v < N; v++) {
202                                for (int u = 0; u < M; u++) {
203                                        float a = A.getf(u, v);
204                                        float b = B.getf(u, v);
205                                        float sigmaG = (float) Math.sqrt(b - a * a);
206                                        Imean.setf(u, v, a);
207                                        Isigma.setf(u, v, sigmaG);
208                                }
209                        }
210                }
211        }
212
213}
